title: Ignota's SCP-999 Pixel Fanart
content:

> **Author:** IronShears

> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7033615433722776838?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1
> **Derivative of:** SCP-999 by ProfSnider and SCP-682 by Dr Gears and Epic Phail Spy
[[/<]]
-----
Okay I ended up not taking a break. Needed a distraction from bad health news. Either way, this turned out really cute! I think I drew 682 way cuter than 999 somehow but... I mean. It turned out adorable. The vibe reminds me of Kirby's pad from Kirby's epic yarn. Which is, I know, an extremely specific reference.

When I started these I said I was only gonna do more recent articles, and I'm still DEFINITELY gonna focus on more recent articles. But... I think I'm gonna throw in some classics just for flavor if people on TikTok ask for them. Gotta reward engagement or whatever.

Plus, when you do old ones they don't have a lot of stories so you don't have to //explain them//. Which means... I can just yell into a microphone about my //opinion// for the full minute. I'm pretty sure it's clear by now based on how much talking I do on my art pages that I LOVE to ramble about my opinion.
 
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
